item.description:
Hey South Shore Social Fun Members!

Booty Vortex is in your neck of the woods at the world famous C Note on Nantasket Beach in Hull.

If you've been part of the Booty experience before, you already know that a great evening of music and dancing is in store.  If you haven't been to a Booty show, strap on your helmets and come on out.

Booty Vortex is a high-energy funk, soul & disco band that will get you up off of your, well, Booty.  They're a 12 piece band with sax, horn, trombone, two percussionists, keyboard, guitar, bass and three vocalists that will rock you down to a sweaty little nub.

Come on out and shake your booties with Booty Vortex.

Notes:

  • Not familiar with Booty Vortex?

    Listen to them here.

  • Haven't been to The C Note?

    Here's a link to a map of The C Note's location.  There's plenty of parking across the street from The C Note.

  • The cover charge at The C Note is generally $10-$15.

  • The music starts at about 9:45.

    I'll be there by 8:45 and I'll be hanging by the bar or at tables to the right of the bar.  Look for my email the afternoon of the show with more details, including my cell #.

    (Email sent at approximately 4:00 p.m.)
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be hanging at the bar or at table to the right of the bar. I look more or less like my profile picture and I'll email my cell # to Yes RSVPs the afternoon of the show.
item.name: A South Shore Music Event: Booty Vortex @ The C Note
